Name: [Affinity] Frosty Eviction
Desc: Lycaon has evoked the Mindscape: <color=#FFAF2C>[Full Moon Momentum]</color>. After launching a Dash Attack or Dodge Counter, your character can <color=#2BAD00>immediately follow up with</color> certain attacks near the end of the Basic Attack combo.
Desc2: Lycaon is as elegant as always, but he has a particularly relentless look in his eye. Any uninvited guest would be met with a cold kick out the front door before they got the chance to say a thing.
